actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to limit to 3 per centum the rate of interest on disaster relief loans made under such Act with respect to any disaster occurring on or after October 1, 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to limit to three percent the rate of interest on the Small Business Administration's share of disaster relief loans made to business affected by: (1) catastrophes such as floods, riots, or civil disorders; (2) disasters, as defined by specified laws; or (3) disease or toxicity introduced into products intended for human consumption.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to limit to 3 per centum the rate of interest on disaster relief loans made under such Act with respect to any disaster occurring on or after October 1, 1978.
